channel.title: Juggalo Holocaust? What the
channel.description:
My friend was telling me today about this alleged Juggalo Holocaust today, and apparently, it's a bit more serious than I came to thought. From what I read [url=http://chicagoist.com/2010/04/28/juggalupdate.php]here[/url] There's a whole website dedicated to this 'cause'. People are nuts man. To be a juggalo is one thing, to be a juggalo that is part of the gang side is another. Killing them because of it is immoral, cause after all, it's a choice. And, well. Killing is wrong. Apparently, this is the head site of all the madness here: http://www.juggaloholocaust.com/
What do?

item.title: Juggalo Holocaust? What the
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:478110”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=596308.msg4198896#msg4198896 date=1357874323]
This is literally the most pointless topic. There is hate websites all over the internet so, who cares? My sister is a part of this so called “gang” and she disappoints me. Honestly, gangs are the dumbest thing ever created.
[/quote]
There is 2 different parts of this “gang” there’s the idiots that treat it as a gang, and the ones that follow ICP for the music.

What a waste of bandwidth.

You don’t have to click on the thread if you don’t want to.[/quote]

I am talking about the site…

Read full topic

item.title: Juggalo Holocaust? What the
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:478110”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=596308.msg4198875#msg4198875 date=1357872463]

It doesn’t matter, there are so many Websites dedicated to so much crazy shit. It’s crazy! I do support some form of action being taken against grown men who wear makeup and associate themselves with a ‘Gang’ though.

This site supports the killing of the males associated in the Juggalo Clan (Yes, they were originally a clan), and raping of the Females.

It’s obviously not a serious Website.
[/quote]
From what I’ve read and heard. (not just that site) the “holocaust” is real.[/quote]

The “American Holocaust” is more real than this is. A Holocaust requires extensive cooperation from a source and a massive amount of death.

Read full topic
